original_text: They will attack Babylonia's horses and chariots, and the foreign soldiers who belong to its army. They will become as weak as women. The enemy soldiers will take Babylon's valuable things. They will take them away for themselves. They will attack Babylonia's horses and chariots, and the foreign soldiers who belong to its army. korean_text: 칼이 그들의 말들과 병거들과 그들 중에 있는 여러 민족의 위에 떨어지리니 그들이 여인들 같이 될 것이며 칼이 보물 위에 떨어지리니 그것이 약탈되리라

sentences.korean_translation: 그 군대에 속한 외국 군사들을 공격할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will become as weak as women
They will take them away for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것들을 자신들을 위해 가져갈 것이다
